titleStmt.title: A letter written upon occasion from the Low-countries, concerning a difference, betwixt the Prince of Orange, and the states, shewing upon what occasion it grew. Whereunto is added, aviso's from severall places, of the taking of the Iland of Providence, by the Spaniard, from the English.
titleStmt.author: La Fin, Charles de.

titleStmt.title: A letter written upon occasion from the Low-countries, concerning a difference, betwixt the Prince of Orange, and the states, shewing upon what occasion it grew. Whereunto is added, aviso's from severall places, of the taking of the Iland of Providence, by the Spaniard, from the English.
titleStmt.author: La Fin, Charles de.

notesStmt.note: Signed on page 4: Charles de la Fin.
Wing has publication year 1641[2]; Thomason catalogue lists under 1642.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
